rules_text:
When Planar Lens enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Grand evolution 2–{3} [i]({3}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
